content.rendered:
Photo by kaboompics

This Week in Genesis, after three (awesome) guest editors* in a row you’re back with me, Nick Davis, I’m afraid. But fortunately there’s a whole lot to love this week, including:

  • New themes
  • Gary J on the UK Genesis podcast
  • Carrie Dils talks Genesis on the Apply Filters podcast
  • Some interesting Genesis stats
  • And your beautiful efforts in the showcase

Let’s get to it!

*If you’d like to guest edit a future edition, give me a shout.

Themes

A sweet new theme by the name of Sweetheart from Heather Jones!

Just released, the Sweetheart theme! Now available https://t.co/TC0K4pWsjO #genesiswp #wordpress #sweetheart pic.twitter.com/YcfwDi5BH2

— Heather Jones (@vivalaviolette) February 10, 2016

Kickstart Pro – a theme by Derry Birkett and, er, me(!) – was released on StudioPress.

Happy to announce the release of the Kickstart Pro theme by @nickcdavis — https://t.co/5NYCByWCMz #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/WWKmDDJkhb

— StudioPress (@studiopress) February 10, 2016

Over the moon to have our first @Lean_Themes theme on @studiopress! All design credit to the awesome @derrybirkett. https://t.co/VH8xSSXXYV

— Nick Davis (@nickcdavis) February 10, 2016

Wes Straham with a theme tease of – presumably – his next theme, Aspire.

Here’s what I’ve been up to lately – https://t.co/MDrj7bJJEp#genesiswp

— Wes Straham (@WesStraham) February 11, 2016

Showcase

Love this from Pilcrow + Pixel for richardnolanphotography.com

Just launched: a new site for London-based fashion & beauty photographer Richard Nolan @London_Photog https://t.co/NsXWnKk3Yh #genesiswp

— Pilcrow + Pixel (@PilcrowPixel) February 5, 2016

Great site design from yivva.com (h/t Calvin Koepke and, yes, we missed it first time too 😉

How, seriously HOW, is this site so perfectly perfect. In every way. Arg — https://t.co/tolmRMsFFk #genesiswp (@bgardner, did you see this?)

— Calvin Koepke (@cjkoepke) February 6, 2016

Archer Creative with a nice site for virginiaprodanbooks.com

Excited to launch an #authorwebsite for https://t.co/zEXT0t2xK6 for her book launch using #Novelty & a custom book page. #GenesisWP

— Archer Creative (@Archer_Creative) February 9, 2016

Former GenesisWP.guide guest editor extraordinare Tara Claeys with a great design for twcfit.com

Integrated @buddypress with @memberpress. https://t.co/vQgLC4omyl Shout @onebigidea for amazing work! #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/PlKr0SuNci

— Tara Claeys (@design_tlc) February 8, 2016

Sheley Marketing with a new site for andersonbeakley.com

New law firm website for @AndersonBeakley -> https://t.co/D5Q638P125@studiopress @GenesisWPguide #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/ALc0ZX22kM

— Sheley Marketing (@SheleyMarketing) February 9, 2016

Thauna at Bellano Studio consistently puts out great stuff and this week is no different with the launch of juliaschild.com

Just launched a redesign for @denisemironti Find something yummy for dinner. https://t.co/ip8sC13pZs #foodbloggers #genesiswp

— Thauna (@BellanoStudio) February 9, 2016

Don Nelson with a nice site for recovery-programs.org

My site redesign that I did for @rnptweets through @catchafire is now live at https://t.co/G90XGdqwG9. #genesiswp

— Don Nelson (@djnels) February 11, 2016

Shaan Nicol with a new site for yojee.com.au

Just launched for Delilah Creative – https://t.co/B6osWE4CGd – built on @BeaverBuilder and @studiopress #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/AbmaA3XTPM

— ChillyBin Web Design (@chillybindesign) February 11, 2016

And finally, Lindsey Riel reveals a new design for her prettydarncute.com website.

I've been busy…Pretty Darn Cute Design has a whole new look, check it out! https://t.co/Ycuj6cBjci… https://t.co/wVuPHOjDgv

— Lindsey Riel (@lindseyriel) February 5, 2016

Podcasts

First up the UK Genesis podcast has an interview with none other than Mr UK Genesis himself, Gary Jones (and here’s a massive photo of Gary to celebrate!).

This Wednesday we have @GaryJ as the guest on our podcast. Details at https://t.co/EtmAvJXgCf #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/rRBwdKhUuo

— UK Genesis (@UKGenesis) February 7, 2016

Meanwhile over on the OfficeHours.fm podcast, Carrie Dils chats to Nellie Akalp on the legal stuff your business needs to know.

Podcast day! Join me at 2pET with @CorpNetNellie to discuss legal ins and outs for your small business! #officefm https://t.co/8coRbMEdgp

— Office Hours Podcast (@officehoursfm) February 11, 2016

Plus, if you missed it, Carrie also put in an appearance on the excellent Apply Filters podcast with Brad Touesnard and Pippin Williamson.

Apply Filters Episode 54 – Carrie Dils on Genesis Development https://t.co/x9a5npmujl

— Apply Filters (@applyfilters) February 5, 2016

Best of the rest

Some interesting stats on Genesis usage, shared by Cathy Finn-Derecki.

Wow! had no idea that the #genesiswp framework is used more widely than the default #wordpress theme. Yay for me: https://t.co/k5qgCIlzht

— Cathy Finn-Derecki (@saracup) February 6, 2016

Jon Barratt reveals that multisite support will be coming to his WP Clips project soon.

WP Clips MULTISITE Coming Soon! Imagine one #genesiswp child theme customised differently on several different sites https://t.co/TD7mnMjPJG

— Jon Barratt (@KrolynStudios) February 6, 2016

Lindsey Riel shares some examples and tips on how to customise your website’s 404 page.

Learn how to add some #creativity and #customize your 404 page: https://t.co/ZooNvfvgRl #genesiswp #WordPress #WebDesign #TADA

— Lindsey Riel (@lindseyriel) February 8, 2016

Frank Schrijvers with a tutorial on adding a custom sidebar to WooCommerce pages on your Genesis theme.

How to add a custom sidebar to WooCommerce pages within your Genesis theme #genesiswp #woocommerce https://t.co/pfLx8BrTfU

— WPStudio (@wpstudiowp) February 9, 2016

And finally…

Stephanie Hellwig with a small tease for you all.

I can hardly wait to share my latest #design project with you all! #wordpress #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/8P8hpP0CGz

— Stephanie Hellwig (@stephanehellwig) February 6, 2016

That’s all for this week, unless I missed your awesome thing, in which case add it in the comments below.

Have a great weekend.

PS If you’d like to guest edit a future edition, drop me a line and let’s chat.

PPS A big thank you to Shaan Nicol this week, he knows why 😉

excerpt.rendered: New themes; Gary Jones and Carrie Dils interviews; plus Genesis might be (even) bigger than you think.
